Ariyamagga Vagga：1．Ariyamagga Vagga．-The fifteenth chapter of the Dasaka Nipāta of the Anguttara Nikāya （A．v．244-7）．It consists of ten suttas on right views and wrong views and their train of consequences．

2．Ariyamagga Vagga．-The nineteenth chapter of the Dasaka Nipāta of the Anguttara Nikāya （A．v．278-81）．It consists of ten suttas on the ten transgressions and the abstinence therefrom．

Ariyamagga Sutta．-The Ariyan way consists of deeds neither dark nor bright with results neither dark nor bright．A．ii．235f．
